charges.charge_description: 21:846=ND.F CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE NARCOTICS-conpsire to distribute cocaine (1s)

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment for a term of 96 months to run concurrently to the NY state sentence he is now serving, or in the alternative, the Court strenuously recommends that this sentence be served concurrently and if necessary designation to a NY state facility; to be followed by 10 years S/R with conditions including: participation in a program approved by USPO for substance abuse including testing &; costs &; no alcohol. (1s)

charges.charge_disposition: 18 months imprisonment; 4 yrs. supervised release; $100.00 Special Assessment due immediately; fines waived; voluntary surrender date 1/19/99. Court recommends FCI-Danbury, CT; shock incarceration program if deft medically able. Counsel to inform court in writing if deft is able medically to participate in program. Deft to participate in a substance abuse program approved by USPO. Appeal rights reviewed with parties. (3)
